full_text:
Page 1133
UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT MEMORANDUM
Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
DATE: 7/30/19
TO: DHO
FROM: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
SUBJECT: DHO Checklist/ EPSTEIN, JEFFREY EDWARD Reg. No.: 76318-054
The UDC refers this case to the DHO, all of the following is attached:
PP44 - To determine if the inmate is GED "Sat or Unsat"
PSDC - To determine the number and types of comps.
PSDG- To determine the amount of available GCT for each Comp.
PSSD- To determine the amount of SGT (if old law)
PD15 - To determine frequency/ repetitive misconduct.
PD16 - To determine if any suspended sanctions available to execute.
BP 293
BP 294
Translator needed:
No
Yes, Language _______________
DOJ-OGR-00025355
